Text: Super! Great quality. Seeding as much as I can. Thank you!
Filename or extension too long.  That's so stupid, my brain hurts.

please for the love of god stop uploading rar files... please just do an avi like a normal person!

also, why upload the same show twice and make them BOTH rar files?

I now have an avi version available for those still wanting one.

http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6642757/The_Venture_Bros_S04_Special_From_the_Ladle_to_the_Grave_the_Sha

Thank you for also uploading the avi format. It's difficult for people who use ubuntu. I have a hard time extracting batch files. This is a throw back from the days of message boards when you were direct downloading large files from your service provider.  I don't think rar files improve speed because the bit torrent process breaks the avi down into pieces when you're downloading from seeders anyway.
